snippet.title: 18 Floors Free DLC｜Official Trailer｜Oculus｜PSVR｜Steam｜VIVE
snippet.description:
This is the game trailer for 18 Floors Free DLC, brought to you by Winking Studios

18 Floors, by developer Aoga Tech, is a VR game that will trap players in mystical and terrifying spacial realities. Combining puzzle-solving elements with room escape survival horror.

An entire floor consisting of an unfamiliar existence, each of the 18 rooms is a different world, with its own history and story: Sealed Room of Phantoms, Train over the Sea of Blood, Forest of Fantasy, City of God, and more.

Follow along as the protagonist Andrea seeks out her true identity and a conspiracy of unimaginable magnitude.


FEATURES
* Level designs bring darkness to life
* Intricate puzzle designs
* Feel the entrapment as if it were real
* Escape is only the beginning


Genre: Adventure, Indie, Casual, Horror, Escape


Read more about 18 Floors:
https://www.winkingworks.com/publishing/games/18_en.html


18 Floors is now on Oculus, PSVR, Steam, VIVE


Get it now!
US PlayStation Store
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2844-CUSA11956_00-18FLOORSAOGAUSAA  

EU PlayStation Store
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP2707-CUSA11538_00-18FLOORSAOGAEURO
